title: SatelliteMission
description: The reference value type defining the satellite mission and the operational period

OperationalPeriod.title: OperationalPeriod
OperationalPeriod.description: An array which lists the start and end year of a particular satellite mission

items.title: OperationalPeriod
items.description: Defines the start and end year of the satellite mission

StartYear.title: Start Year
StartYear.description: The year that the satellite mission became operational or started

EndYear.title: End Year
EndYear.description: The year that the satellite mission ceased or ended. Leave blank if the mission is still active.
